section.p: Adding F5 Networks products to your deployment can provide critical application delivery services consistently across the data center, private cloud, and public cloud. This allows hybrid users to experience the availability and performance they expect.

The F5 Networks BIG-IP product family includes purpose-built hardware, software, and virtualized solutions. Depending on the appliance you use, one or more BIG-IP modules can be added to get the functionality your deployment requires.
Creating an application centered strategy using F5 BIG-IP is supported in all of the following scenarios:

ul.li: migrating and re-architecting existing applications to a public cloud IbaaS (load balancing as a service) provider
moving to Software as a Service (SaaS)
deploying applications in a hybrid environment

section.note: Keep in mind that flexible licensing options are available, based on where you want to deploy.
section.p: The HPE Helion Third-Paty Hardware team integrated F5 BIG-IP into a deployment by configuring an F5 BIG-IP device to run as a load balancer for Neutron LBaaSv2. The installation uses a VXLAN tunnel (VTEP) to connect a private network from the cloud to the F5 BIG-IP appliance.
section.note: must be deployed before the F5 installation is performed. This is due to the F5 driver not being built directly into by default, and because the F5 installation depends on the existence of Neutron environment.
